Baxter in Gazebo

Documented by Jarvis Schultz

August 29th, 2014

Check out the demo

Requirements

  • python-wstool
  • python-rosdep
  • ros-hydro-pcl-conversions
  • ros-hydro-control-msgs
  • ros-hydro-cmake-modules
  • ros-hydro-qt-build
  • ros-hydro-moveit-full
  • ros-hydro-driver-common
  • ros-hydro-image-common
  • ros-hydro-rostest-gazebo
  • Baxter Simulation repository (must request access by emailing RSDK.support@rethinkrobotics.com

Overview

Learn how to quickly get a Baxter simulation running in Gazebo. Execute the joint position keyboard example in the simulation.
